Title: Establishes the Stony brook campus housing ground lease
Summary: Authorizes the state university trustees, without any public bidding, to lease and otherwise contract to make available to the Stony Brook Housing Development Corporation, a portion of the lands of the university on its campus, for the purpose of building undergraduate student, graduate student, faculty and staff housing.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing the Stony brook campus housing ground lease
